attributes.action: School attendance should be optional until the test system’s fixed.
attributes.additional_details: To keep children and their family safe and healthy. The rate of transmission is rising and most vulnerable people are in the risk of sending their children or grandchildren to public place (school).
attributes.background: It is risky for student to attend in school while there is not a proper test and trace system. We ask government to make school optional until ill the test system fixed or a vaccine introduced

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551740
